documents.text: Retrieval-Augmented Generation improves factual accuracy by retrieving relevant documents and grounding generated responses in external knowledge sources.
BM25 is a bag-of-words retrieval algorithm that ranks documents based on term frequency and inverse document frequency.
RAG evaluation measures retrieval quality using metrics like Recall@k, MRR, and nDCG to assess whether relevant documents are returned.
Observability in GenAI systems includes logging, metrics, tracing, and auditability to ensure reliability in production.
